description.en:
A token with its own digital ecosystem, that reinvests in both the platform and the community with each transaction. Holders reap the rewards of smart value management. Unstoppable. Don't miss your chance to join.

Why bother with tokens that don't even know how to manage their earnings? We saw a desire and a need for something better, so we created SMARTWORTH. We will develop or acquire digital platforms that rely on SMARTWORTH as the single source of payment. Each SMARTWORTH transaction incurs a tax, which we will use to ensure continuous sustainable growth of our community into the millions. The synergy spreads throughout the ecosystem as every element grows together from the platforms to the users, holders, transactions, devaluations, distributions, taxes, and marketing, all making SMARTWORTH more valuable day by day. This cannot be stopped!

We have big plans for the investment of all taxes collected. First, we'll be developing an exchange platform for digital products and services. Our second milestone will be the development of a community platform. From our third project onward, your votes will be an integral part of project development.
